dl.dd: Type: one of the values below

A determined template.XULElem("progressmeter") is used in cases where you know how long an operation will take. An undetermined template.XULElem("progressmeter") can be used when you don't and will typically be drawn as a spinning barber pole.

ul.li: determined: The progress meter uses its value attribute to determine the amount of the bar that is filled in.
